sentences.chinese: 哪个国家将主办下一届世界杯？

sentences.chinese: 她把会议延至明天上午9点举行。

sentences.chinese: 凯茜在这一关系中似乎扮演着十分被动的角色。

sentences.chinese: 今晚的演出8点开始。

sentences.chinese: 我觉得他太想念她了。你也许能使他振作起来。

sentences.chinese: 他虽然年纪还小，却已独自旅行过了。

sentences.chinese: 亚哈的海上历险

sentences.chinese: 一个历险故事

name: be on sb's back about sth

sentences.chinese: 这只袋鼠有一个难题。

sentences.chinese: 这是一只来自澳洲的袋鼠。

sentences.chinese: 袋鼠胃中有一种特殊的细菌能使其放的屁中不含有甲烷。 科学家想将这种细菌移至牛羊的胃中，以抑制它们所排放的大量有害气体。

sentences.chinese: 我每逢月初交付房租。

sentences.chinese: 这些男孩子根本无视权威。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of admiring someone or what they do, especially because of their personal qualities, knowledge, or skills
to admire someone because they have high standards and good qualities such as fairness and honesty

name: efficient
trans: adj. 效率高的，有功效的

sentences.english: a very efficient secretary
sentences.chinese: 效率高的秘书

sentences.english: an efficient use of land
sentences.chinese: 土地的有效使用

sentences.english: Lighting is now more energy efficient.
sentences.chinese: 如今的照明设备更加节能。

detailed_translations.english: if someone or something is efficient, they work well without wasting time, money, or energy

name: extra
trans: adj. 额外的，分外的，附加的
adv. 额外，另外；特别，格外

sentences.english: Could you get an extra loaf of bread?
sentences.chinese: 你能多拿一条面包吗？

sentences.english: Allow extra time for your journey.
sentences.chinese: 要给你的旅程多留出点时间。

sentences.english: Drivers are advised to take extra care.
sentences.chinese: 建议司机开车要格外小心。

sentences.english: You’re going to have to work extra hard to pass the exam.
sentences.chinese: 你要格外用功才能通过考试。

detailed_translations.english: more of something, in addition to the usual or standard amount or number
used to emphasize an adjective or adverb

sentences.english: New safety measures were being demanded after last night’s horrific train crash.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚发生严重的火车相撞事故后，民众要求制定新的安全措施。

sentences.english: The new bridge was erected as a temporary measure to replace the one which was destroyed by floods.
sentences.chinese: 建这座新桥是为了临时代替被洪水毁坏的那座桥。

detailed_translations.english: an action, especially an official one, that is intended to deal with a particular problem

name: reflection
trans: n. 沉思；反射；映像；反映

sentences.english: Can you see your reflection in the glass?
sentences.chinese: 你能看到玻璃里你的影像吗？

sentences.english: ...the reflection of a beam of light off a mirror.
sentences.chinese: …一束光线在镜面上的反射。

sentences.english: Inhibition in adulthood seems to be a reflection of a person's experiences as a child.
sentences.chinese: 成年期的压抑似乎是一个人童年经历的一种反映。

detailed_translations.english: an image that you can see in a mirror, glass, or water

sentences.english: new graduates seeking employment
sentences.chinese: 正在求职的刚毕业的大学生

sentences.english: Drivers are advised to seek alternative routes.
sentences.chinese: 驾车者被告知需另寻其他路线。

sentences.english: They quickly sought to distance themselves from the protesters.
sentences.chinese: 他们迅速设法远离抗议者。

detailed_translations.english: to look for someone or something

name: escape
trans: vi. & vt. 逃脱，躲避；逃跑；避开，避免；被遗忘

sentences.english: He broke down the locked door and escaped.
sentences.chinese: 他砸开上锁的门，逃走了。

sentences.english: Vents allow any steam to escape if the system overheats.
sentences.chinese: 如果系统过热，排放口可使蒸汽逸出。

sentences.english: The girl had no chance of escape.
sentences.chinese: 那女孩没有机会逃跑。

detailed_translations.english: to leave a place when someone is trying to catch you or stop you, or when there is a dangerous situation
the act of getting away from a place, or a dangerous or bad situation

name: be meant to do sth
trans: 注定要做某事，应做某事

sentences.english: They are working together to benefit the whole community.
sentences.chinese: 他们在为整个社区的利益共同努力。

detailed_translations.english: if you benefit from something, or it benefits you, it gives you an advantage, improves your life, or helps you in some way

detailed_translations.chinese: 利益，恩惠；救济金，保险金，津贴
detailed_translations.english: money provided by the government to people who are sick, unemployed, or have little money

sentences.english: I dress for comfort, not fashion.
sentences.chinese: 我穿衣服只讲舒服，不追求时髦。

sentences.english: Alan was very reluctant to leave the warmth and comfort of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦很不情愿离开暖和舒适的火堆。

sentences.english: Now you can watch your favorite movies in the comfort of your own home.
sentences.chinese: 现在你可以舒舒服服地在自己家里看你最喜欢的电影了。

sentences.english: Whenever he was upset, he would turn to her for comfort and advice.
sentences.chinese: 他每当心烦意乱时，就会去向她寻求安慰和建议。

sentences.english: He longed to take her in his arms and comfort her.
sentences.chinese: 他很想把她搂在怀里安慰她。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of being physically relaxed and satisfied, so that nothing is hurting you, making you feel too hot or cold etc
to make someone feel less worried, unhappy, or upset, for example by saying kind things to them or touching them

name: joy
trans: n. 高兴，愉快；令人高兴的人（或事），乐趣

sentences.english: the look of joy on her face
sentences.chinese: 她脸上的喜悦表情

sentences.english: The garden was his pride and joy.
sentences.chinese: 这座花园是他的骄傲和乐趣所在。

detailed_translations.english: great happiness and pleasure

name: failure
trans: n. 失败；失败的人（或事）；未履行；故障

sentences.english: Successful people often aren’t very good at dealing with failure.
sentences.chinese: 一帆风顺的人往往不太擅长应对失败。

sentences.english: I always felt a bit of a failure at school.
sentences.chinese: 我上学时总觉得自己有点失败。

detailed_translations.english: a lack of success in achieving or doing something

name: in full measure
trans: 最大程度地，最大限度地

name: moment
trans: n. 时光，时机；瞬间；某个时刻

sentences.english: It was one of the most exciting moments in his life.
sentences.chinese: 这是他一生中最激动人心的时刻之一。

sentences.english: She may be in trouble at this very moment and trying to call you.
sentences.chinese: 此时此刻她可能遇到了麻烦，正想方设法给你打电话。

sentences.english: I remember the moment when I first saw him after the operation.
sentences.chinese: 我还记得手术后第一次见到他的那一刻。

sentences.english: Quinn always seems to be in the right place at the crucial moment.
sentences.chinese: 奎因似乎总能在关键时刻把握时机。

sentences.english: I just this moment (= only a very short time ago ) arrived and already Dan wants to know when I’m leaving.
sentences.chinese: 我才刚到，丹就想知道我什么时候走。

sentences.english: At this moment in time it would be inappropriate to comment on the situation.
sentences.chinese: 这个时候恐怕不宜对局势作出评论。

sentences.english: It was quiet for a moment, then Rae spoke.
sentences.chinese: 沉寂了片刻，然后雷开始说话了。

detailed_translations.english: a particular point in time

name: indeed
trans: adv. 其实，实际上；的确；真正地

sentences.english: The blood tests prove that Vince is indeed the father.
sentences.chinese: 验血证明文斯确实是父亲。

sentences.english: ‘Would it help if you had an assistant?’ ‘It would indeed.’
sentences.chinese: “你要是有个助手，会有帮助吗？”“那是肯定的。

sentences.english: Most of the essays were very good indeed.
sentences.chinese: 这些文章大多数都非常好。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize a statement or answer

name: well-meaning
trans: adj. 出于好心的，善意的

name: recognize
trans: vt. 承认，意识到；认出，辨别出

sentences.english: I didn’t recognize you in your uniform.
sentences.chinese: 你穿上制服我认不出你了。

sentences.english: It was malaria, but Dr Lee hadn’t recognized the symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 这是疟疾，但李医生没有认出症状。

sentences.english: One must recognise that homesickness is natural.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须承认思乡是正常的。

detailed_translations.english: to know who someone is or what something is, because you have seen, heard, experienced, or learned about them in the past

name: thorough
trans: adj. 彻底的，全面的；仔细的

sentences.english: The doctor gave him a thorough check-up.
sentences.chinese: 医生给他做了一次全面的体检。

sentences.english: a thorough and detailed biography
sentences.chinese: 详尽的传记

sentences.english: The police investigation was very thorough.
sentences.chinese: 警方的调查十分彻底。

sentences.english: thorough notes of the meeting
sentences.chinese: 详尽的会议记录

detailed_translations.english: including every possible detail

sentences.english: 1.5 million people are in immediate danger of death from starvation.
sentences.chinese: 150万人正因饥饿而即将面临死亡的危险。

detailed_translations.english: a creature that looks like a human  skeleton  , used in paintings, stories etc to represent the fact that people die

sentences.english: Which company do you work for?
sentences.chinese: 你在哪家公司上班？

sentences.english: I called the phone company about the bill.
sentences.chinese: 我就电话账单的事给电话公司打了电话。

sentences.english: The company was set up just after the war.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司是战后不久成立的。

sentences.english: People judge you by the company you keep (= the people you spend time with ) .
sentences.chinese: 人们根据你交往的朋友来判断你的为人。

detailed_translations.english: a business organization that makes or sells goods or services

name: crowd
trans: n. 一伙人，一帮人；人群

sentences.english: A vast crowd gathered in the main square.
sentences.chinese: 主广场上聚集了一大群人。

sentences.english: She mingled with the crowd of guests, exchanging greetings.
sentences.chinese: 她穿梭在宾客中间和他们打招呼。

sentences.english: Saturday’s game was watched by a capacity crowd (= the maximum number of people that a sports ground etc can hold ) .
sentences.chinese: 星期六的比赛座无虚席。

sentences.english: Troops fired tear gas and shots to disperse a crowd of 15,000 demonstrators.
sentences.chinese: 军队发射催泪弹并开枪来驱散15,000名示威群众。

sentences.english: I didn’t know him; he wasn’t one of the usual crowd.
sentences.chinese: 我不认识他，他不是平时那一群人里的。

sentences.english: He wanted to go unnoticed, to be one of the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 他想默默无闻地做个普通人。

detailed_translations.english: a large group of people who have gathered together to do something, for example to watch something or protest about something

sentences.english: He was a painter and poet.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位画家兼诗人。

detailed_translations.english: someone who writes poems

sentences.english: I really admire the way she brings up those kids all on her own.
sentences.chinese: 我十分佩服她独力把那些孩子抚养大。

detailed_translations.english: to respect and like someone because they have done something that you think is good

sentences.english: a glass of wine
sentences.chinese: 一杯葡萄酒

detailed_translations.english: an alcoholic drink made from grapes, or a type of this drink
to entertain someone well with a meal, wine etc

name: skip
trans: vt. 不做（应做的事情等）；跳过
vi. 蹦蹦跳跳地走；略过

sentences.english: They saw the man with a little girl skipping along behind him.
sentences.chinese: 他们看到那个男人身后跟着一个蹦蹦跳跳的小女孩。

detailed_translations.english: to go from one subject to another in no fixed order
a skipping movement

sentences.english: If you like cottage cheese, add some fruit and/or yogurt!
sentences.chinese: 如果你喜欢农家鲜干酪，那就加些水果和酸奶吧！

sentences.english: Not bad. It seems you are super yogurt lover. You have so many in your cart.
sentences.chinese: 不错。似乎你是超级喜欢酸奶。你的手推车上放了如此多的酸奶。

sentences.english: It has yogurt powder but it is mostly made up of sugar and palm-kernel oil-and all the fat is mostly saturated.
sentences.chinese: 那其中确实含有一部分酸乳酪粉，但主要成分确是糖和棕榈核油，而且脂肪也以饱和脂肪为主。

detailed_translations.english: Yogurt is a food in the form of a thick, slightly sour liquid that is made by adding bacteria to milk. A yogurt is a small container of yogurt.

name: faint
trans: adj. 昏眩的；微弱的；可能性不大的

sentences.english: She gave a faint smile.
sentences.chinese: 她淡淡一笑。

sentences.english: a very faint noise
sentences.chinese: 很微弱的声响

sentences.english: the faint light of dawn
sentences.chinese: 微弱的晨光

detailed_translations.chinese: 模糊的；头晕的；虚弱的；[医] 衰弱的
detailed_translations.english: difficult to see, hear, smell etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 昏倒；变得微弱；变得没气力
detailed_translations.english: to suddenly become unconscious for a short time
an act of becoming unconscious

sentences.english: He retired immediately after the end of the war.
sentences.chinese: 战争一结束他就退休了。

sentences.english: Those most immediately involved in the disaster will be given support.
sentences.chinese: 灾害最直接受害者将获得援助。

detailed_translations.english: very soon before or after something

name: concentrate
trans: vi. & vt. 集中（注意力、思想等）；全神贯注

sentences.english: Now please concentrate.
sentences.chinese: 现在请集中注意力。

sentences.english: Adrian was finding it difficult to concentrate.
sentences.chinese: 阿德里安觉得自己很难集中注意力。

sentences.english: Italian industry is concentrated mainly in the north.
sentences.chinese: 意大利的工业主要集中在北部。

sentences.english: orange juice made from concentrate
sentences.chinese: 用浓缩橙汁冲兑的橙汁

detailed_translations.english: to think very carefully about something that you are doing

sentences.english: All you see on TV is sex and violence these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今在电视上看到的尽是性和暴力。

sentences.english: They had sex in the back seat of his car.
sentences.chinese: 他们在他的汽车后座上做了爱。

sentences.english: She no longer wanted to have sex with him.
sentences.chinese: 她再也不想和他做爱了。

sentences.english: the dangers of casual sex
sentences.chinese: 性关系随便的危险性

detailed_translations.english: the physical activity that two people do together in order to produce babies, or for pleasure

detailed_translations.chinese: 引起…的性欲；区别…的性别
detailed_translations.english: to find out whether an animal is male or female

name: extreme
trans: n. 极端不同的感情（或境况、行为方式等）

sentences.english: Extreme poverty still exists in many rural areas.
sentences.chinese: 许多农村地区仍处于赤贫状态。

sentences.english: extreme cold
sentences.chinese: 严寒

sentences.english: He had extreme difficulty getting hold of the ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 他费了极大的劲找配料。

detailed_translations.english: very great in degree
a situation, quality etc which is as great as it can possibly be – used especially when talking about two opposites

name: slim
trans: adj. 苗条的；微薄的，小的

sentences.english: a slim young woman
sentences.chinese: 身材苗条的年轻女子

sentences.english: a slim waist
sentences.chinese: 纤腰

detailed_translations.chinese: 苗条的；修长的；微小的；差的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is slim is attractively thin
to make yourself thinner by eating less, taking a lot of exercise etc

detailed_translations.chinese: (Slim)人名；(阿拉伯)萨利姆；(英、西)斯利姆

name: concerned
trans: adj. 担心的，忧虑的；关注的，关切的

sentences.english: Divorce is very painful, especially when children are concerned.
sentences.chinese: 离婚是非常痛苦的，涉及孩子的话更是如此。

sentences.english: Some of the farmers concerned suffer particularly from the low prices.
sentences.chinese: 涉及的农民当中，有些人因低价受到的损失尤为惨重。

sentences.english: We are trying to reach an agreement with all concerned (= everyone who is involved or affected ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们试图与相关各方达成协议。

detailed_translations.english: involved in something or affected by it

detailed_translations.chinese: 关心（concern的过去时和过去分词）；与…有关

sentences.english: the long-term effects of the drug
sentences.chinese: 这种毒品的长期影响

sentences.english: I could feel the effects of the thin mountain air.
sentences.chinese: 我能感觉到山上稀薄空气产生的影响。

sentences.english: This ingredient also has the effect of making your skin look younger.
sentences.chinese: 这种成分还有使皮肤看上去更年轻的效果。

sentences.english: A system failure has a knock-on effect throughout the whole hotel.
sentences.chinese: 系统故障会给整个酒店带来连锁反应。

sentences.english: the cumulative effect of human activities on the global environment
sentences.chinese: 人类活动对全球环境日积月累的影响

sentences.english: A much lower dose of the painkiller can still produce the desired effect.
sentences.chinese: 大量减少该止痛药的服用剂量依然能产生预期的效果。

sentences.english: In mental illness, there is a complex relationship between cause and effect.
sentences.chinese: 精神疾病有复杂的因果关系。

detailed_translations.english: a change that is caused by an event, action etc

sentences.english: That had an interesting and extremely useful side effect.
sentences.chinese: 那有一个有趣和非常有用的负作用。

sentences.english: Yet another side effect is that I seem to think much better when I eat this way.
sentences.chinese: 而且，还有第三种作用，那就是我的思考能力通过这种饮食法大大提高了。

sentences.english: As a side effect of all this, you can use a stylesheet that doesn't do anything to a document, and simply take one format as input and output that document to any other format.
sentences.chinese: 这种方法的另外一个作用是，您可以使用一个不含任何文档操作的样式表，并使用某种格式作为输入，然后将这种格式输出为任意其他的格式。

detailed_translations.english: an effect that a drug has on your body in addition to curing pain or illness

name: prove
trans: linking v. 后来被发现是

sentences.english: You’re wrong, and I can prove it.
sentences.chinese: 你错了，我可以证明。

sentences.english: To prove his point (= show that he was right ) , he mentioned several other experiments which had produced similar results.
sentences.chinese: 为了证明自己的观点，他提到了另外几个结果相似的实验。

detailed_translations.english: to show that something is true by providing facts, information etc

sentences.english: His family then moved to a slightly larger house.
sentences.chinese: 他的家后来搬到了一间稍微大一点儿的房子。

sentences.english: Each person learns in a slightly different way.
sentences.chinese: 每个人学习的方式都略有不同。

detailed_translations.english: Slightly means to some degree but not to a very large degree

name: diet
trans: vi. 节食，进行规定饮食

sentences.english: She doesn’t eat a very healthy diet.
sentences.chinese: 她的饮食不是很健康。

sentences.english: It is important to have a balanced diet.
sentences.chinese: 饮食均衡很重要。

sentences.english: Rice is the staple diet (= the main food that a group of people usually eat ) .
sentences.chinese: 大米是主食。

detailed_translations.english: the kind of food that a person or animal eats each day

sentences.english: Nutrition and exercise are essential to fitness and health.
sentences.chinese: 营养和运动是保持健康所必不可少的。

sentences.english: a nutrition expert
sentences.chinese: 营养专家

detailed_translations.english: the process of giving or getting the right type of food for good health and growth

name: function
trans: vi. 起作用，正常工作，运转

sentences.english: Her legs have now ceased to function .
sentences.chinese: 她的双腿现在已经丧失正常功能了。

sentences.english: You know I can’t function (= cannot perform normal activities ) without a coffee in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 你知道的，我早上不喝杯咖啡就无法工作。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工作， 运行； 起作用
detailed_translations.english: to work in the correct or intended way

detailed_translations.chinese: 功能，职务；【数】函数；重大聚会
detailed_translations.english: the purpose that something has, or the job that someone or something does

sentences.english: They will certainly need to take in plenty of liquid.
sentences.chinese: 他们会肯定需要吸收大量液体。

detailed_translations.english: If people, animals, or plants take in air, drink, or food, they allow it to enter their body, usually by breathing or swallowing

name: energetic
trans: adj. 精力充沛的，充满活力的

sentences.english: an energetic man
sentences.chinese: 精力旺盛的男子

sentences.english: an energetic drive to get more customers
sentences.chinese: 争取更多客户的十足干劲

detailed_translations.english: having or needing a lot of energy or determination

sentences.english: The cheaper drugs are just as effective in treating arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 较便宜的药品对治疗关节炎同样有效。

sentences.english: the painting’s highly effective use of colour
sentences.chinese: 绘画中得心应手的色彩运用

sentences.english: Training is often much less effective than expected.
sentences.chinese: 训练的效果往往远低于预期。

sentences.english: the most effective ways of reducing inner city congestion
sentences.chinese: 减少旧城区交通拥挤最有效的办法

detailed_translations.english: successful, and working in the way that was intended

name: frightened
trans: adj. 害怕的，惊吓的，受惊的

sentences.english: Don’t be frightened. We’re not going to hurt you.
sentences.chinese: 别害怕，我们不会伤害你的。

sentences.english: To tell the truth, I was frightened to death (= very frightened ) .
sentences.chinese: 说实话，我怕得要命。

sentences.english: a frightened horse
sentences.chinese: 一匹受惊的马

detailed_translations.chinese: 害怕的；受惊的；受恐吓的
detailed_translations.english: feeling afraid

detailed_translations.chinese: 害怕；使吃惊；吓走（frighten的过去分词）

name: within
trans: prep. 在（某段时间）之内；在（某段距离、范围）之内；在...里

sentences.english: We should have the test results back within 24 hours.
sentences.chinese: 我们24小时之内应该可以拿到化验结果。

sentences.english: He fell sick and died within a matter of weeks.
sentences.chinese: 他病倒了，不出几星期就死了。

sentences.english: Within an hour of our arrival Caroline was starting to complain.
sentences.chinese: 我们到达还没有一小时，卡罗琳就开始抱怨了。

sentences.english: The real dangers to these rebels came from within.
sentences.chinese: 对于这些叛乱分子真正的危险来自内部。

detailed_translations.english: before a certain period of time has passed
Within is also an adverb

name: rather
trans: adv. 相反，而是；相当；更准确地说

sentences.english: I grew up in rather unusual circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 我在相当不寻常的环境中长大。

sentences.english: I'm afraid it's a rather long story.
sentences.chinese: 我恐怕这是个相当长的故事。

sentences.english: I’d rather have a quiet night in front of the TV.
sentences.chinese: 我宁愿晚上安安静静地看看电视。

detailed_translations.english: fairly or to some degree

sentences.english: a south-facing aspect
sentences.chinese: 朝南方向

detailed_translations.english: one part of a situation, idea, plan etc that has many parts

name: pressure
trans: n. 心理压力，紧张；压力；要求，催促

sentences.english: They are putting pressure on people to vote yes.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在向民众施加压力，要求他们投赞成票。

sentences.english: You must never give in to pressure .
sentences.chinese: 你绝不能屈从压力。

detailed_translations.english: an attempt to persuade someone by using influence, arguments, or threats

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…施加压力， 迫使， 说服
detailed_translations.english: to try to make someone do something by making them feel it is their duty to do it

name: contribute
trans: vi. & vt. 是...的原因之一；捐赠，捐献；增加，添加

sentences.english: The U.S. is contributing $4 billion in loans, credits, and grants.
sentences.chinese: 美国以信贷和赠与的方式捐助了40亿美元。

sentences.english: Local businesses have agreed to contribute.
sentences.chinese: 当地的公司已经同意捐助了。

detailed_translations.english: To contribute money or resources to something means to give money or resources to help pay for something or to help achieve a particular purpose

name: memory
trans: n. 记忆力，记性；记忆，回忆

sentences.english: He has lots of happy memories of his stay in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 他对在日本逗留的那段时光有许多美好的回忆。

sentences.english: The data is stored in the computer’s memory.
sentences.chinese: 数据储存在电脑的存储器里

detailed_translations.english: something that you remember from the past about a person, place, or experience

name: attack
trans: vt. & vi. 攻击；侵袭；抨击

sentences.english: a bomb attack
sentences.chinese: 炸弹袭击

sentences.english: a knife attack
sentences.chinese: 持刀攻击

sentences.english: an arson attack
sentences.chinese: 纵火袭击

sentences.english: victims of racial attacks
sentences.chinese: 种族袭击的受害者

detailed_translations.chinese: 攻击， 进攻； 突然发作
detailed_translations.english: an act of violence that is intended to hurt a person or damage a place

sentences.english: Please pay the full amount (=  of money  ) by the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 请在月底前全额付清。

detailed_translations.english: a quantity of something such as time, money, or a substance

name: schedule
trans: n. 日程安排，工作计划；时间表

sentences.english: How can he fit everything into his busy schedule ?
sentences.chinese: 他是怎么把所有的事情都排进自己忙碌的时间表的？

sentences.english: I’m going to be working to a very tight schedule (= including a lot of things that must be done in a short time ) .
sentences.chinese: 我的工作安排将会非常紧。

detailed_translations.english: a plan of what someone is going to do and when they are going to do it

name: negative
trans: adj. 消极的，负面的；坏的，有害的；否定的

sentences.english: students with a negative attitude to school
sentences.chinese: 对上学抱消极态度的学生

sentences.english: They have a uniformly negative image of the police.
sentences.chinese: 他们都对警察印象不好。

sentences.english: Jean rarely sounded so negative about her mother.
sentences.chinese: 琼很少这么说她母亲不好。

detailed_translations.chinese: 否定的，消极的；负的，阴性的
detailed_translations.english: considering only the bad qualities of a situation, person etc and not the good ones

detailed_translations.chinese: 负片， 底片； 负数
detailed_translations.english: an image on a photographic film that shows dark areas as light and light areas as dark, from which the final picture is printed

sentences.english: a plastic spoon
sentences.chinese: 塑料汤匙

sentences.english: plastic bags
sentences.chinese: 塑料袋

detailed_translations.english: made of plastic

sentences.english: major/minor surgery
sentences.chinese: 大 / 小手术

detailed_translations.english: medical treatment of injuries or diseases that involves cutting open a person's body and often removing or replacing some parts; the branch of medicine connected with this treatment

sentences.english: a beautiful campus in New England
sentences.chinese: 新英格兰的一个美丽校园

detailed_translations.english: the land and buildings of a university or college, including the buildings where students live

name: treatment
trans: n. 治疗；对待，待遇；处理

sentences.english: There have been great advances in the treatment of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 癌症治疗有了很大的进展。

sentences.english: Just lately, Kyra has been giving me the silent treatment (= refusing to speak to me because she is angry with me ) .
sentences.chinese: 就在最近，凯拉一直对我不理不睬。

detailed_translations.english: something that is done to cure someone who is injured or ill

sentences.english: Dave’s a nice guy when you get to know him.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫是个好人，你了解他后就知道了。

sentences.english: Jake’s a real tough guy.
sentences.chinese: 杰克是个很厉害的家伙。

detailed_translations.english: a man

sentences.english: This is a fine book; a worthy addition to the series.
sentences.chinese: 这是一本好书——是对这套丛书有价值的增补。

detailed_translations.chinese: 加， 加法； 附加物
detailed_translations.english: something that is added to something else, often in order to improve it

sentences.english: In addition, you can elect to share your files with others.
sentences.chinese: 另外，您可以决定与其他的用户共享 您的文件。

detailed_translations.english: used when you want to mention another person or thing after sth else

sentences.english: You can’t judge a book by its cover, as the old saying goes.
sentences.chinese: 老话说得好，人不可貌相。

detailed_translations.english: a well-known short statement that expresses an idea most people believe is true and wise

name: hang over
trans: 使忧心忡忡，担心可能发生

sentences.english: ...a young man in jeans and a worn T-shirt.
sentences.chinese: …一个穿着牛仔裤和破旧T恤衫的年轻人。

detailed_translations.english: trousers made of denim(= a strong, usually blue, cotton cloth )

sentences.english: a deep male voice
sentences.chinese: 低沉的男声

sentences.english: traditional male values
sentences.chinese: 传统的男性价值观

sentences.english: Motor-racing has largely been a male preserve (= something that only men have been involved with ) .
sentences.chinese: 赛车基本上是男人的专利。

detailed_translations.english: typical of or relating to men or boys
a man

sentences.english: female voters
sentences.chinese: 女性选民

sentences.english: Over half of the staff is female.
sentences.chinese: 半数以上的员工是女性。

detailed_translations.english: relating to women or girls
an animal that belongs to the sex that can have babies or produce eggs

name: beauty
trans: n. 美，美丽；美人，美好的东西

sentences.english: her beauty and grace
sentences.chinese: 她的美貌和优雅风姿

sentences.english: an area of outstanding natural beauty
sentences.chinese: 一个自然风景极美的地区

sentences.english: Millions of dollars are spent each year on beauty products.
sentences.chinese: 每年都有上千万的钱花在美容产品上。

sentences.english: She was considered a great beauty in her youth.
sentences.chinese: 她年轻时被视为大美人。

detailed_translations.english: a quality that people, places, or things have that makes them very attractive to look at

name: fashion
trans: n. 时尚，时兴；流行款式

sentences.english: Their music will never go out of fashion (= stop being fashionable ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的音乐永不过时。

sentences.english: Please leave the building in an orderly fashion.
sentences.chinese: 请大家有秩序地离开大楼。

sentences.english: Perhaps they could sit down and discuss things in a civilised fashion.
sentences.chinese: 也许他们可以坐下来心平气和地商量事情。

sentences.english: She will be working out her problems in her own fashion (= in the way that she usually does this ) .
sentences.chinese: 她会以自己的方式来解决她的问题。

detailed_translations.english: something that is popular or thought to be good at a particular time

name: shadow
trans: n. 阴影，影子；昏暗处，阴暗处

sentences.english: the long dark shadow of an old oak tree
sentences.chinese: 一棵老橡树长长的影子

detailed_translations.chinese: 阴影；影子；幽灵；庇护；隐蔽处
detailed_translations.english: the dark shape that someone or something makes on a surface when they are between that surface and the light
to follow someone closely in order to watch what they are doing
the group of politicians in the British parliament who would become ministers if their party was in government

sentences.english: digital TV
sentences.chinese: 数字电视

sentences.english: a digital signal
sentences.chinese: 数字信号

sentences.english: a digital camera
sentences.chinese: 数码照相机

sentences.english: digital recording
sentences.chinese: 数字录音

detailed_translations.english: using a system in which information is recorded or sent out electronically in the form of numbers, usually ones and zeros

sentences.english: the series of events that led to the outbreak of war
sentences.chinese: 导致战争爆发的一系列事件

sentences.english: The police are investigating a series of attacks in the area.
sentences.chinese: 警方在调查该地区发生的一连串袭击事件。

sentences.english: There’s been a whole series of accidents on this road.
sentences.chinese: 这条路上发生了一连串的交通事故。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一系列， 连续； 丛书， 连续剧
detailed_translations.english: several events or actions of a similar type that happen one after the other

sentences.english: All right, there's no need to show off.
sentences.chinese: 好啦，没有必要炫耀了。

detailed_translations.english: If you say that someone is showing off, you are criticizing them for trying to impress people by showing in a very obvious way what they can do or what they own

name: external
trans: adj. 外来的，外在的；外面的，外部的

sentences.english: The open cities will be testing grounds for our external policies.
sentences.chinese: 使开放城市成为对外政策的窗口。

sentences.english: The ear canal also named middle ear splays out at the external position.
sentences.chinese: 耳道亦称中耳，内小外大呈喇叭状。

sentences.english: Riddled with a thousand gaping wounds, this reactionary clique is now beset with difficulties and contradictions both in internal and external affairs.
sentences.chinese: 今天， 这个反动集团百孔千疮， 内外交困， 矛盾重重。

name: strength
trans: n. 优势；力气，力量；实力

sentences.english: The police force is below strength at the moment (= there are fewer police than there should be ).
sentences.chinese: 目前警力不足。

sentences.english: the strength of a rope
sentences.chinese: 绳子的强度

detailed_translations.english: the number of people in a team, army etc

name: talent
trans: n. 天资，天赋；人才，天才

sentences.english: He has a lot of talent , and his work is fresh and interesting.
sentences.chinese: 他很有天赋，作品新颖有趣。

sentences.english: a persuasive speaker with a natural talent for leadership
sentences.chinese: 有领导天赋、颇有辩才的演说者

sentences.english: His latest book reveals hidden talents.
sentences.chinese: 他最新的一本书展现了他深藏不露的才能。

sentences.english: Sadly, she inherited none of her father’s musical talent.
sentences.chinese: 可惜的是，她一点都没有继承她父亲的音乐天赋。

sentences.english: He is a great talent.
sentences.chinese: 他是个了不起的人才。

sentences.english: Britain’s footballing talent
sentences.chinese: 英国的足球天才

detailed_translations.english: a natural ability to do something well

sentences.english: Jean accompanied her on the piano .
sentences.chinese: 琼为她钢琴伴奏。

detailed_translations.english: a large musical instrument that has a long row of black and white  key s  . You play the piano by sitting in front of it and pressing the keys.

sentences.english: It is right that we should care about and take pride in the way we express ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 我们就应该时时在意自己的表达方式，并且要引以为豪，这也是应有的态度。

sentences.english: I take pride in your achievements and avail myself of this opportunity to extend to you my best wishes for your success and happiness.
sentences.chinese: 我为你的成绩感到骄傲，并借此机会向您致以良好的祝愿，祝你今后取得更大的成绩，幸福愉快。

sentences.english: The content of the media course includes scripting, editing and camera work.
sentences.chinese: 大众传媒课程的内容包括稿件写作、剪辑和摄像操作。

detailed_translations.english: the ideas, facts, or opinions that are contained in a speech, piece of writing, film, programme etc

sentences.english: We like our staff to show their individuality rather than wear a uniform.
sentences.chinese: 我们喜欢员工穿出个性，而不是穿制服。

detailed_translations.chinese: 个性；个人；个人特征；个人的嗜好（通常复数）
detailed_translations.english: the qualities that make someone or something different from other things or people

name: achievement
trans: n. 成就，成绩；达到，完成

sentences.english: His great achievement is to make all the players into a united team.
sentences.chinese: 他的伟大成就在于把所有选手组织成一支团结的队伍。

sentences.english: As we climbed the final few metres, we felt a sense of achievement.
sentences.chinese: 我们攀登最后几米的时候，有一种成就感。

detailed_translations.english: something important that you succeed in doing by your own efforts

name: app
trans: n. 应用程序，应用软件（application 的缩写）
